featuredOrganizations.title: Feeding America
featuredOrganizations.description: The Feeding America food bank network is committed to serving communities and people facing hunger in America during the COVID-19 pandemic. They provide meals to more than 40 million people each year through their 200 food banks, 60,000 food pantries and meal programs.

featuredOrganizations.title: Direct Relief
featuredOrganizations.description: Since COVID-19 first appeared, Direct Relief has delivered 1.4 million masks, 2.6 million gloves, and more than 575,000 other pieces of personal protective equipment to healthcare workers at 1,063 medical institutions in 32 countries worldwide.

communityOrganizations.title: Center for Family Life
communityOrganizations.description: Center for Family Life, a program of SCO Family of Services, is a neighborhood-based family and social services organization with deep roots in Sunset Park, Brooklyn. The work of Center for Family Life is grounded in the daily, lived experience of the Sunset Park community and guided by a vision of neighborhood families and social institutions evolving over time and contributing to each otherâ€™s ongoing development. During COVID-19, Center for Family Life is providing food pantry programs, virtual after school programs, and free tax preparation to serve families impacted by COVID-19.
communityOrganizations.buttonLabel: Donate to Center for Family Life

communityOrganizations.title: Mobilize Love
communityOrganizations.description: Mobilize Love deploys a fleet of outreach trucks to give children, youth, and families access to basic human services and mentorship relationships. This includes the first and only non-profit food truck in the Bay Area. The organization is committed to providing tens of thousands of free hot meals to those who are food insecure during this difficult economic time. Join Jeremy in donating to Mobilize Love and feed thousands of families and hungry in the Bay Area.

communityOrganizations.title: Tapestry LA
communityOrganizations.description: Want to be a light to those in need during these challenging times? Please join Tapestry LA and the Jeremy Lin Foundation in #BeTheLight campaign, we are partnering to raise funds to benefit Feeding America, to support families in need during COVID-19. Every dollar raised will also be matched by Jeremy himself. Thanks in advance for your contribution to this cause.
